page.title: 09SPORTS CENTRES AND CLUBS
page.content: There are four of these centres in this area. Derbyshire{Lawn Tennis}Club stands on a site first purchased in 1947.It has 3 hard courts,1 indoor and a grass area for 5 courts.It has a wide appeal attracting about 60% of its members from outside the area. Littleover Tennis Club was first started in 1920 for members of a now extinct firm,Midland Drapery,it has 3 courts with over 100 members,mainly from the area around the club. Mickleover{Golf Club}covers an area of about 60 acres.It has 18 holes and 500 members,30% of which come from within the area. Shaftesbury Centre was reclaimed recently from an area of terraced houses,it contains two outdoor five-a-side pitches and an indoor sports hall,offering many sports.
